fields.text: Greetings, fresh apprentice! I am Maris, guardian of the magical springs.
To succeed, you must master the power of water in the trials ahead.
The wind will whisper the secret of life into your ear—listen closely.
By learning the art of flight, you shall ascend to the sky spires.
Earth is the root of every bloom; come with me and let us build bridges.
Challenges are like mountains—but you can stand firm as a peak.
Fire is both power and destruction, and wielding it is an art.
For the true trial, you must surrender your heart to the flame—are you ready?
Welcome to the Academy Citadel. Your ultimate mission is to restore the balance of the elements.
Once all trials are complete, you will uncover a great truth.
